dashboard.overviewTitle: All your tests in one place
dashboard.overviewBody: Create, edit and launch tests for learners in just one click. Monitor statistics and stay in control right from this dashboard.

createTest.title: Create a new test
createTest.subtitle: Craft questions, answers and supporting images. Once saved you will return to the dashboard.

takeTest.invitationGuest: Guest mode is perfect for open attempts without sign-in — just add a name so we know who is taking the test.
takeTest.invitationAccount: Use your account to keep detailed stats and save progress.
takeTest.missingDescription: It looks like you opened the test page without specifying an identifier. Return to the dashboard and pick a test.
takeTest.setupTitle: How would you like to start?
takeTest.setupDescription: Choose the mode that fits you best. Guest mode only needs a name while signed-in attempts will link results to your profile.
takeTest.accountOption: Take the test with my account
takeTest.accountDescription: Keeps access to your profile and attempt history.
takeTest.guestOption: Take the test as a guest
takeTest.guestDescription: Share this link with learners who don't need to sign in.
takeTest.tipText: Guest attempts don't save detailed analytics. Switch to your account if you need full progress tracking.
takeTest.shareDescription: Copy the link and send it to learners. Everyone can choose the mode that works best.
takeTest.adviceText: If the test is timed, remind participants ahead of time and make sure they have a stable connection.
